comment.raw:
/**
 * A Svelte store that uses localStorage to store data asyncronously.
 *
 * @param key - The key to store the data under.
 *
 * @param value - The initial value of the store.
 *
 * @returns a writable store.
 *
 * @example
 * ```ts
 * const store = asyncLocalStorageStore('foo', 'bar')
 * ```
 *
 */
comment.summary: A Svelte store that uses localStorage to store data asyncronously.

params.name: key
params.description: The key to store the data under.

params.name: value
params.description: The initial value of the store.

blocks.content: const store = asyncLocalStorageStore('foo', 'bar')
